body:
Just ran into the above error again, this time when calling `setFullScreen()`. Here's another, more complete, stack trace:

```

21  com.github.electron.framework   0x0000000107e96466 mate::internal::Invoker<mate::internal::IndicesHolder<0ul, 1ul>, atom::api::Window*, bool>::DispatchToCallback(base::Callback<void (atom::api::Window*, bool), (base::internal::CopyMode)1>) + 22
```

I hava the same question very like yours. 

It happens when I am using the software 'omnet++' to simulate some networks.

Can you help me ?Thank you anyway!!!

I could't find the folder `/Library/Caches/com.apple.xbs/Sources/AppKit/AppKit-1404.47/CGS.subproj/` in my os x path.Is it right?how can I fix it... I hava no idea at all...
